column4: In the picture to the right i sais: 01/09/2008-1945-"some numbers"-00
that's most likely a graphics card problem... what graphics does your machine have?

just before it boots, can you hit ctrl-alt-F1
before the GUI starts*
Paddy: Do you have any clue?

oh, sorry Shasirax
Paddy: before gnab
I've heard of people just using 8.04 LTS or 8.10 to get older ATi cards to work... it's ridiculous and inconvenient, but you may have to do it.
don't worry about the ctrl-alt-F1 thing for now.
yes, but i cant start my computer... thats the problem
is it a clean 9.04 install, or did you upgrade from a previous version?
it's clean
do you have wireless or wired internet on that machine?
wired, hate wireless :)
good. OK, I need you to boot the machine, and before the visual corruption happens, press ctrl-alt-F1

yep.
